DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Safety Immunogenicity Tetravalent Chimeric Dengue Vaccine Healthy Volunteers Between Ages 1.5 - 45 Years
DOC.criteria: In good health Normal laboratory value screen Abnormal ECG History significant dermatologic ( skin ) disease within last 6 month Diabetes mellitus History immunodeficiency History recur headache migraine Hypersensitivity vaccine Use amphetamine , opiate , cannabinoids History alcohol abuse Pregnant lactate female
